options.name: Iron Husk
options.description: Res is set to 6.

options.name: Hellish Larynx
options.description: The bearer gains Breath Attack (Str 3, AP 2, Magical Attacks). This Manifestation only affects the model part taking it, not its mount.

options.name: Visage of Cosmic Horror
options.description: One use only. Can be activated at the start of any phase or when Choosing Equipment and Abilities in the Melee Phase. When activated, all friendly units within 6" gain Horror. Effects last until the end of the Player Turn.

options.name: Mirrored Scales
options.description: Each Melee Attack allocated towards the model  for which a natural ‘1’ is rolled to hit hits the attacking model's Health Pool instead.

options.name: Kaleidoscopic Flesh
options.description: Hard Target (1).

options.name: Guiding Kaleidoscopic Flesh
options.description: The model and each R&F model in its unit gains Hard Target (1).

options.name: Mark of the Eternal Champion
options.description: If taken by a Wizard, the model knows Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell) as an additional spell. If taken by a unit or model that is not a Wizard, it gains Wizard Conclave (1) with Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell) instead.

options.name: Hammer Hand
options.description: +1 Att.

options.name: Unnatural Roots
options.description: A side with one or more models with Unnatural Roots Engaged in Combat adds +1 to its Combat Score.

options.name: Brimstone Secretions
options.description: Immune (Divine Attacks).

options.name: Centipede Legs
options.description: +2" Mob.

options.name: Chitinous Scales
options.description: +2 Arm, to a maximum of 3.

options.name: Dark Hide
options.description: Ambush (Terrain Feature touching your Deployment Zone). The roll for this Ambush is done in Game Turn 1, and it is automatically successful.

options.name: Living Shield
options.description: One use only. Can be activated at the start of any phase or when Choosing Equipment and Abilitites in the Melee Phase. When activated: +2 Def. Effects last until the end of the Player Turn.

options.name: Piercing Spike
options.description: +1 AP.

options.name: Greenfire Eyes
options.description: The model's Charge Range rolls when made towards a unit containing Light Armour or Metal Armour are Maximised.

options.name: Venom Sacs
options.description: Poison Attacks.

options.name: Digestive Vomit
options.description: If the model has previously been on the winning side of a combat while having this Manifestation, it gains +1 Str and +1 AP.

options.name: Broodmother
options.description: For each Health Point loss the model causes with Melee Attacks towards enemy units, roll a D6 at the end of the Agility Step. For each rolled 6+, the model's Health Pool Raises 1 Health Point.

options.name: Unhinging Jaw
options.description: Zeal (towards Height 3--5).

options.name: Segmented Shell
options.description: When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds (X), reduce X by 1, to a minimum of 1.

options.name: Divining Snout
options.description: Charge Range rolls made towards units containing at least one Enchanted Item are Maximised.

options.name: Smothering Coils
options.description: Zeal (towards Scoring).

options.name: Mesmerising Plumage
options.description: Afflict (1 Def, 1 Off).

options.name: Hidden Knives
options.description: Melee Attacks allocated towards an enemy unit's Flank or Rear Facing from the model  gain +1 Str and +1 AP.

options.name: Hot Blood
options.description: Devastating Charge (+2 Agi).

options.name: Torporous Tendrils
options.description: Afflict (-2 Agi).

options.name: Sorcerous Antennae
options.description: Add one additional Magic Dice to your pool during Siphon the Veil in your Magic Phase for each unit containing this Manifestation.

options.name: All-Seeing Eye
options.description: Accurate.

options.name: Whipcrack Tail
options.description: Melee Attacks gain +1 to hit.

options.name: Curved Tusks
options.description: The model's Melee Attacks gain +1 Str and +1 AP. For each Melee Attack for which a natural ‘1’ is rolled to wound, this model suffers a hit that wounds automatically, with AP 10.

options.name: Incendiary Ichor
options.description: Aegis (3+, against Flaming Attacks) and Flaming Attacks. The model automatically fails any Fortitude Saves it takes.

options.name: Bronze Backbone
options.description: First Strike (Hatred)

options.name: Golden Helm
options.description: Courage Tests taken by the unit are subject to Minimised Roll.

options.name: Horns of Hubris
options.description: Vanguard (3").
